title: Update harfbuzz to 8.3.0
body:
**Description of Change**

Update harfbuzz to the latest version.

**Bugs Fixed**

None.

<!-- Provide links to issues here. Ensure that a GitHub issue was created for your feature or bug fix before sending PR. -->

**API Changes**

None.

<!-- REPLACE THIS COMMENT

List all API changes here (or just put None), example:

Added: 
 
- `string Class.Property { get; set; }`
- `void Class.Method();`

Changed:

 - `object Cell.OldPropertyName => object Cell.NewPropertyName`

-->

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

<!-- Describe any non-bug related behavioral changes that may change how users app behaves when upgrading to this version of the codebase. -->

**Required skia PR**

https://github.com/mono/skia/pull/118

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of main at time of PR
- [ ] Merged related skia PRs
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation

comments.author: satmandu
comments.body:
Harfbuzz is now at 8.2.2: https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/releases/tag/8.2.2

meanwhile Google's skia is being built against https://github.com/harfbuzz/harfbuzz/commit/4cfc6d8e173e800df086d7be078da2e8c5cfca19 (pre-8.2.0) as per chrome/m120: https://github.com/google/skia/blob/chrome/m120/DEPS

(Meanwhile, according to that deps document it is also being built against the older libjpeg-turbo 2.1.4: https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/deps/libjpeg_turbo.git/+/ed683925e4897a84b3bffc5c1414c85b97a129a3 )

comments.author: alexanderdibenedetto
comments.body: Any news as to when this will be merged?
